channel.title: How do I make an NPC say stuff?
channel.description: I know how to spawn an NPC but I don't know how to change or add what they say. HELP?

item.title: How do I make an NPC say stuff?
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

This is VERY basic.

Open up NPChandler.java

Search:

(misc.random2(50) == 1)

Then add this below it:

if (npcs[i].npcType == YOUR NPC ID) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "YOUR TEXT!"; } }

Replace the YOURNPCID with the ID of the NPC you want and replace the YOUR TEXT with what you want it to say.
